A spiritual retreat for one day in every month by a priest of the Society of Jesus ; translated out of French, in the year 1698. Retraite spirituelle pour un jour de chaque mois. English Croiset, Jean, 1656-1738.
[12], 353, 3 p.
s.n., [Paris? : 1700]
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Attributed to Jean Croiset. cf. NUC. Ecclesiastical permits on p. [12] dated 1700. Table of contents: p. [6]-[11]. Errata: p. [1]-[3] at end.
